questions.questionText: What is the best practice for ensuring road safety?

options.text: Driving over the speed limit to minimize time on the road
Ignoring traffic signals when no other vehicles are present
Using the phone only when connected to the car's hands-free system
Consuming alcohol before driving if feeling still capable of controlling the vehicle

questions.explanation: Using a hands-free system for calls reduces distractions while driving, thereby enhancing road safety.

questions.questionText: What is the correct posture to adopt when working on a computer to avoid injuries?

options.text: Sitting with shoulders leaned forward towards the screen
Keeping feet hanging without touching the ground
Adjusting the chair so that eyes are level with the top of the monitor and feet are flat on the floor
Using a chair without back support to encourage an upright posture

questions.explanation: Having a properly adjusted chair and correct posture helps prevent back pain and injuries related to poor workplace ergonomics.

questions.questionText: What is the basic safety rule when using chemicals in a laboratory?

options.text: Eating and drinking in the work area to save time
Working in an unventilated space to prevent fume spread
Wearing personal protective equippment such as gloves and safety goggles
Using open containers to facilitate access to chemicals

questions.explanation: Using personal protective equipment iss crucial to avoid direct exposure to hazardous chemicals and to protect the userâ€™s health.

questions.questionText: What behavior should be adopted to reduce the risk of accidents in a warehouse?

options.text: Running to move faster from one point to another
Ignoring safety protocols to increase productivity
Ensuring all aisles are clear and goods are properly stacked
Using malfunctioning equipment to not interrupt the workflow

questions.explanation: Keeping aisles clear and materials properly organized helps prevent falls and other accidents in warehouse environments.
